titleStmt.title: The life and death of the most blessed among women, the Virgin Mary mother of our Lord Iesus VVith the murder of the infants in Bethlehem, Iudas his treason, and the confession of the good theife and the bad.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.
